response.overview: The events of the film take place in a neighborhood ruled by gossip and violence in East Amman, where a deceitful young man does the impossible to be with his girlfriend, but her mother stands in the way of completing their story, and when a blackmailer captures a video of them in an intimate situation, the mother secretly resorts to a gang to put an end to what happened. It happens, but things don't go as planned.
response.title: الحا
